participant_1.background:
My daddy brings home flowers for me.
I like playing outside in the sun with my dolls.
My mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside.
I sleep in a princess bed.
I am a four year old girl with brown eyes and hair.

participant_2.background:
I am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
My daily driver is a bicycle that you pedal with your hands.
My favorite band is up.
I once fell up a whole flight of stairs.

content.text: My name is participant_1. I am (age) years old. I have (hair color) hair and (eye color) eyes. I like to play outside in the sun with my dolls. I also like to sleep in a princess bed.

That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm participant_2. I'm (age) years old. I have (hair color) hair and (eye color) eyes. I'm the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I ride a bicycle that you pedal with your hands. My favorite band is U2. I once fell up a whole flight of stairs.
That's really interesting! I've never met anyone who works in the french fry research department before.
It's a lot of fun! We get to experiment with all sorts of different flavors and textures.
That sounds awesome! I love french fries.
Me too! I could eat them every day.
What's your favorite flavor of french fry?
I like them all, but I think my favorite is the sweet potato fry.
I've never tried those before. I'll have to give them a try next time I'm at Del Taco.
Thanks for talking to me! I'm having a lot of fun.
You're welcome! I'm glad to hear that.
I'm going to go play outside now. Bye!
